args.subject: Travel Itinerary
args.body:
Dear Emma,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to provide you with your travel itinerary for the upcoming trip.

Flight Details:
- Departure: New York (JFK)
- Arrival: Los Angeles (LAX)
- Flight Number: AA1234
- Departure Time: 10:00 AM
- Arrival Time: 1:00 PM

Hotel Details:
- Hotel Name: Hilton Downtown LA
- Address: 123 Main St, Los Angeles, CA 90012
- Check-in Time: 3:00 PM
- Check-out Time: 12:00 PM

Car Rental Details:
- Company: Enterprise Rent-A-Car
- Car Type: Toyota Camry
- Pick-up Time: 2:00 PM
- Drop-off Time: 10:00 AM (next day)

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
